metadata.titleEn: 34 key nodes of Pan third pole historical extreme precipitation dataset (2000-2018)
metadata.titleCn: 泛第三极34个关键节点历史极端降水数据集（2000-2018）
metadata.description:
The pan third pole historical extreme precipitation data set includes 2000-2018 extreme precipitation identification data. One belt, one road, was used to assess the rainfall in the important area along the GPM IMERG Final Run (GPM) daily rainfall. The extreme precipitation threshold of 34 important nodes was evaluated by percentile method. The daily precipitation period was identified by the calculated threshold, and the surface inundation area was produced on the basis of extreme precipitation.
The data range mainly includes 34 key nodes of Pan third pole (Vientiane, Alexandria, Yangon, Calcutta, Warsaw, Karachi, yekajerinburg, Chittagong, Djibouti, etc.)
The data set can provide the basis for local government decision-making, so as to correctly identify extreme precipitation and reduce the loss of life and property caused by extreme precipitation.
metadata.descriptionCn:
泛第三极历史极端降水数据集包括了2000-2018年极端降水识别数据。该数据集以GPM IMERG Final Run(GPM)日值降雨数据为基础，评估了一带一路重要节点区域的降雨量，用百分位法评估了34个重要节点的极端降水阈值，并运用计算出的阈值识别出了发生极端降水的日期，以此为基础制作了极端降水发生时地表的淹没范围。
数据范围主要是泛第三极34个关键节点（万象、亚历山大、仰光、加尔各答、华沙、卡拉奇、叶卡婕琳堡、吉大港、吉布提等国家）
该数据集可以为当地政府部门决策提供依据，以便正确识别极端降水，降低极端降水所带来的生命财产损失。
metadata.instructions: The data is stored in the format of TXT text. The file name is "historical extreme precipitation identification + country name. TXT". It can be opened and read by a text program (such as Notepad).
metadata.instructionsCn: 数据以txt文本格式存储，文件名称为“历史极端降水识别+国家名称.txt”，可用文本程序（如记事本）打开读取。

background: Precipitation is a crucial component of the global water cycle and a fundamental part of the climate system. Obtaining accurate spatiotemporal distribution of precipitation plays a vital role in water resource management, agricultural production, weather forecasting, and flood and drought disaster monitoring. Traditional methods for obtaining precipitation data are based on ground rain gauge observations, which have high precision at point scales but are sparse in distribution in remote or complex terrain areas due to logistical challenges. With the rapid development of satellite remote sensing technology over the past decade, many high spatiotemporal resolution remote sensing precipitation products have emerged, providing new data support for global and regional precipitation research. Among them, the TRMM satellite, jointly developed and launched by NASA and JAXA in 1997, has been widely used in climate and hydrological research in tropical regions. Building on the successful operation of the TRMM satellite, NASA and JAXA launched the latest GPM satellite on February 28, 2014, which, in addition to inheriting the TRMM's ability to detect medium and large-scale precipitation, also carries the latest dual-frequency radar system and improved microwave radiometer performance, enhancing the detection capability for light and solid precipitation. However, due to the short operational time of the satellite, existing accuracy validation studies of GPM precipitation data in Mainland China have been limited to short-term evaluations, with time series not exceeding a year, and lacking monthly scale analysis. Moreover, current validation efforts often use station density, climate, and topographic characteristics for regional division, without conducting accuracy evaluations on a basin scale, which is a crucial unit in hydrological research.
research objective: This study aims to systematically evaluate and compare the accuracy of TRMM and GPM satellite-derived precipitation products over Mainland China and its nine major river basins, using daily and monthly scale data from 824 meteorological stations from April 2014 to December 2016. The objective is to provide a basis for selecting suitable satellite precipitation products for precipitation research and hydrological modeling in various basins across China.
challenges: However, yet rather poor accuracy of the GPM precipitation product in high altitude and arid regions as well as high false alarm ratio for light precipitation over the drainage basins in the Southeast China remained a challenge to improve its IMERG inversion algorithm.
methods: The study uses ground precipitation data from the China Meteorological Data Network, including daily measured precipitation data from 824 meteorological stations across Mainland China. The TRMM 3B42 V7 and GPM IMERG satellite precipitation data used in this study are sourced from NASA. To ensure data consistency, GPM data is resampled to the same spatial resolution as TRMM. The study evaluates the accuracy of satellite precipitation products using Pearson correlation coefficient (R), root mean square error (ERMS), mean absolute error (EMA), and relative error (ER) as traditional evaluation metrics. Additionally, detection capability is assessed using detection rate (POD), false alarm rate (RFA), frequency bias (B), and equitable threat score (SET) as categorical statistical indicators.
dataset: The ground precipitation data used in this study is sourced from the China Meteorological Data Network, including daily measured precipitation data from 824 meteorological stations across Mainland China. The TRMM 3B42 V7 and GPM IMERG satellite precipitation data used in this study are sourced from NASA. The TRMM 3B42 V7 product has a spatial resolution of 0.25°×0.25° and a temporal resolution of 3 hours, covering 50°N to 50°S. The GPM IMERG Final Run product, resampled to the same spatial resolution as TRMM, has a spatial resolution of 0.1°×0.1° and a temporal resolution of 0.5 hours, covering 60°N to 60°S.
findings: Overall, as the successor of the TRMM, GPM outperformed TRMM over each drainage basin as well as in whole Mainland China, which implied the great potential of its application in various studies.
backgroundCn: 降水是全球水循环的重要组成部分，也是气候系统的基本部分。获取准确的降水时空分布在水资源管理、农业生产、天气预报以及洪水和干旱灾害监测中发挥着至关重要的作用。传统的降水数据获取方法主要依赖于地面雨量计观测，这些观测在点尺度上具有高精度，但由于后勤挑战，在偏远或复杂地形地区分布稀疏。随着过去十年卫星遥感技术的快速发展，许多高时空分辨率的遥感降水产品相继出现，为全球和区域降水研究提供了新的数据支持。其中，TRMM卫星是由NASA和JAXA于1997年共同开发和发射的，已广泛应用于热带地区的气候和水文研究。在TRMM卫星成功运行的基础上，NASA和JAXA于2014年2月28日发射了最新的GPM卫星，该卫星不仅继承了TRMM在中大尺度降水探测方面的能力，还搭载了最新的双频雷达系统和改进的微波辐射计性能，增强了对轻微和固态降水的探测能力。然而，由于卫星的运行时间较短，目前对GPM降水数据在中国大陆的准确性验证研究仅限于短期评估，时间序列不超过一年，且缺乏按月尺度的分析。此外，目前的验证工作往往根据站点密度、气候和地形特征进行区域划分，而未在流域尺度上进行准确性评估，而流域是水文研究中的一个关键单位。
research objectiveCn: 本研究旨在系统评估和比较TRMM和GPM卫星衍生降水产品在中国大陆及其九大主要河流流域的准确性，使用2014年4月至2016年12月期间824个气象站的日数据和月数据。其目的是为在中国各流域的降水研究和水文建模中选择合适的卫星降水产品提供依据。
challengesCn: 然而，GPM降水产品在高海拔和干旱地区的准确性较差，以及在中国东南部流域对轻度降水的高虚警率，仍然是改进其IMERG反演算法的一大挑战。
methodsCn: 本研究使用来自中国气象数据网的地面降水数据，包括来自中国大陆824个气象站的日降水量测量数据。研究中使用的TRMM 3B42 V7和GPM IMERG卫星降水数据均来源于NASA。为了确保数据的一致性，GPM数据被重采样至与TRMM相同的空间分辨率。研究通过皮尔逊相关系数（R）、均方根误差（ERMS）、平均绝对误差（EMA）和相对误差（ER）等传统评估指标来评估卫星降水产品的准确性。此外，使用检出率（POD）、虚警率（RFA）、频率偏差（B）和公平威胁评分（SET）等分类统计指标来评估检测能力。
datasetCn: 本研究使用的地面降水数据来源于中国气象数据网，包括来自中国大陆824个气象站的日降水量测量数据。本研究中使用的TRMM 3B42 V7和GPM IMERG卫星降水数据均来源于NASA。TRMM 3B42 V7产品的空间分辨率为0.25°×0.25°，时间分辨率为3小时，覆盖范围为50°N至50°S。GPM IMERG最终运行产品经过重采样，具有与TRMM相同的空间分辨率，空间分辨率为0.1°×0.1°，时间分辨率为0.5小时，覆盖范围为60°N至60°S。
findingsCn: 总体而言，作为TRMM的继任者，GPM在每个流域以及整个中国大陆的表现都优于TRMM，这表明其在各种研究中的应用潜力巨大。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in improving the accuracy of satellite precipitation data in arid regions?

Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战是GPM降水产品在高海拔和干旱地区的准确性较差，以及在中国东南部的流域中轻降水的误报率较高。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'extreme precipitation identification' in the context of precipitation datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在降水数据集的背景下，“极端降水识别”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Extreme precipitation identification refers to the process of determining specific dates when extreme precipitation events occur, using calculated thresholds based on percentile methods. This is used to evaluate and recognize extreme precipitation levels at key nodes within a region, helping to assess the impact and coverage of such events.
Definition.AnswerCn: 极端降水识别是指通过基于百分位数方法计算的阈值，确定极端降水事件发生的具体日期。这一过程用于评估和识别区域内关键节点的极端降水水平，有助于评估此类事件的影响和覆盖范围。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'remote sensing precipitation products' imply in satellite-based data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: “遥感降水产品”在卫星数据收集中意味着什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Remote sensing precipitation products are datasets derived from satellite observations that offer high spatiotemporal resolution data for precipitation. These products, like those from the TRMM and GPM satellites, provide significant data support for global and regional precipitation research, especially in areas difficult to reach by ground-based methods.
Definition.AnswerCn: 遥感降水产品是基于卫星观测得出的数据集，提供高时空分辨率的降水数据。这些产品，如TRMM和GPM卫星的数据，为全球和区域降水研究提供了重要的数据支持，特别是在那些难以通过地面方法到达的地区。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of 'accuracy validation' in the context of satellite precipitation data?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在卫星降水数据的背景下，“准确性验证”的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Accuracy validation is the process of assessing the reliability and precision of satellite-derived precipitation data compared to ground-based measurements. It involves using statistical metrics such as Pearson correlation coefficient, root mean square error, and others to evaluate the performance of satellite data, ensuring it can be trusted for research and hydrological modeling.
Definition.AnswerCn: 准确性验证是评估卫星衍生降水数据与地面测量数据的可靠性和精确性的过程。它涉及使用统计指标，如皮尔逊相关系数、均方根误差等，来评估卫星数据的性能，确保其在研究和水文建模中可以被信任。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do satellite-derived precipitation products such as TRMM and GPM compare in terms of accuracy for measuring precipitation in diverse geographical terrains?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 卫星衍生的降水产品，如TRMM和GPM，在不同地理地形中测量降水的准确性如何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The GPM satellite-derived precipitation product generally outperformed the TRMM product across various drainage basins and in Mainland China as a whole. However, GPM still faced challenges with poor accuracy in high altitude and arid regions, as well as a high false alarm ratio for light precipitation in Southeast China.
Comparison.AnswerCn: GPM卫星衍生的降水产品在各个流域和整个中国大陆的表现通常优于TRMM产品。然而，GPM在高海拔和干旱地区的准确性仍然面临挑战，并且在中国东南部轻降水的误报率较高。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the spatial and temporal resolutions of the TRMM 3B42 V7 and GPM IMERG satellite precipitation products compare when used in hydrological research?
Comparison.QuestionCn: TRMM 3B42 V7和GPM IMERG卫星降水产品在水文研究中，空间分辨率和时间分辨率的比较如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The TRMM 3B42 V7 product has a spatial resolution of 0.25°×0.25° and a temporal resolution of 3 hours, while the GPM IMERG Final Run product, resampled to match TRMM's resolution, has a finer spatial resolution of 0.1°×0.1° and a temporal resolution of 0.5 hours, offering improved detail for hydrological research.
Comparison.AnswerCn: TRMM 3B42 V7 产品的空间分辨率为 0.25°×0.25°，时间分辨率为 3 小时，而 GPM IMERG 最终运行产品经过重采样以匹配 TRMM 的分辨率，具有更细的空间分辨率 0.1°×0.1° 和 0.5 小时的时间分辨率，为水文研究提供了更好的细节。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What underlying factors could account for the challenges in accurately detecting light precipitation in high altitude and arid regions using satellite-derived precipitation products?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 哪些潜在因素可能导致在高海拔和干旱地区使用卫星衍生降水产品时准确检测轻微降水的挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: One challenge in accurately detecting light precipitation in high altitude and arid regions using satellite-derived products like GPM is the poor accuracy due to the satellite's IMERG inversion algorithm. High altitude and arid regions can present unique challenges in terms of topography and climate, which might affect the satellite's ability to accurately measure precipitation.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在高海拔和干旱地区，使用卫星衍生产品（如GPM）准确检测轻微降水面临一个挑战，即由于卫星的IMERG反演算法导致的低准确性。高海拔和干旱地区在地形和气候方面可能存在独特的挑战，这可能影响卫星准确测量降水的能力。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the inclusion of a dual-frequency radar system in satellite technology enhance detection capabilities for different types of precipitation?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在卫星技术中包含双频雷达系统如何增强对不同类型降水的探测能力？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The inclusion of a dual-frequency radar system in satellite technology, such as the one used by the GPM satellite, enhances detection capabilities by improving the detection of light and solid precipitation. This allows for more accurate readings across various precipitation scales, which is critical for climate and hydrological research.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在卫星技术中，双频雷达系统的应用，例如GPM卫星所使用的，增强了探测能力，通过改善对轻微和固态降水的检测。这使得在各种降水尺度上能够获得更准确的读数，这对气候和水文研究至关重要。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What methodological factors should be considered when selecting suitable satellite precipitation products for hydrological modeling in diverse geographic regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在选择适合不同地理区域的水文模型的卫星降水产品时，应考虑哪些方法论因素？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: When selecting suitable satellite precipitation products for hydrological modeling in diverse geographic regions, it's important to consider factors such as the accuracy of different products like TRMM and GPM in various basins, the spatial and temporal resolution of the datasets, and the specific climatic and topographic characteristics of the region being studied. Evaluation metrics like Pearson correlation coefficient, root mean square error, and detection rate can aid in assessing the suitability of these products.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在选择适合不同地理区域的水文模型的卫星降水产品时，重要的是考虑多个因素，例如TRMM和GPM等不同产品在各个流域中的准确性、数据集的空间和时间分辨率，以及所研究区域的特定气候和地形特征。评估指标如皮尔逊相关系数、均方根误差和检测率可以帮助评估这些产品的适用性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the limited accuracy of GPM precipitation data in high altitude and arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致GPM降水数据在高海拔和干旱地区准确性有限的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The limited accuracy of GPM precipitation data in high altitude and arid regions is attributed to the challenges in the IMERG inversion algorithm which struggles with detecting light precipitation and has a high false alarm ratio in these areas.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: GPM降水数据在高海拔和干旱地区的有限准确性归因于IMERG反演算法面临的挑战，该算法在检测轻微降水方面存在困难，并且在这些地区的误报率较高。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is satellite remote sensing technology increasingly important for collecting precipitation data in remote or complex terrain areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 卫星遥感技术在收集偏远或复杂地形地区的降水数据方面越来越重要的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Satellite remote sensing technology is increasingly important for collecting precipitation data in remote or complex terrain areas due to logistical challenges that make ground rain gauge observations sparse despite their high precision at point scales.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感技术在收集偏远或复杂地形地区的降水数据方面越来越重要，因为后勤挑战使得地面雨量计观测稀疏，尽管它们在点尺度上具有很高的精度。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What underlying factors contribute to the need for resampling GPM data to ensure consistency with TRMM data?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 哪些潜在因素导致需要对GPM数据进行重采样，以确保与TRMM数据的一致性？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The need for resampling GPM data to ensure consistency with TRMM data arises because the GPM IMERG product has a different spatial and temporal resolution, requiring adjustments to match the spatial resolution of TRMM for comparative accuracy evaluations.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 需要对GPM数据进行重采样，以确保与TRMM数据的一致性，因为GPM IMERG产品具有不同的空间和时间分辨率，需要进行调整以匹配TRMM的空间分辨率，以便进行比较准确的评估。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using satellite remote sensing technology instead of ground rain gauge observations for collecting precipitation data in remote or complex terrain areas?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用卫星遥感技术代替地面雨量计观测在偏远或复杂地形地区收集降水数据的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using satellite remote sensing technology provides high spatiotemporal resolution data that can cover extensive and remote areas where ground rain gauge observations are sparse due to logistical challenges. This can enhance the detection of precipitation patterns and support global and regional precipitation research. However, the accuracy of these satellite-derived data, especially for light and solid precipitation, can be poorer in high altitude and arid regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用卫星遥感技术提供高时空分辨率的数据，可以覆盖广泛和偏远的地区，而在这些地区，由于后勤挑战，地面雨量计观测稀少。这可以增强降水模式的检测，并支持全球和区域降水研究。然而，这些卫星衍生数据的准确性，尤其是在高海拔和干旱地区，对于轻度和固态降水的准确性可能较差。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the short operational time of a satellite impact the evaluation of its precipitation data accuracy, and what methodologies could mitigate these issues?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 卫星的短期运行时间如何影响其降水数据准确性的评估，以及哪些方法可以减轻这些问题？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The short operational time of a satellite can limit the long-term accuracy validation studies, as time series evaluations might not exceed a year and may lack monthly scale analysis. To mitigate these issues, methodologies could include using resampling techniques to ensure data consistency, and employing a combination of traditional evaluation metrics and categorical statistical indicators to assess accuracy comprehensively.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 卫星的短期操作时间可能限制长期准确性验证研究，因为时间序列评估可能不会超过一年，并且可能缺乏按月的规模分析。为了解决这些问题，可以采用重采样技术以确保数据一致性，并结合传统评估指标和分类统计指标来全面评估准确性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What could be the impact of evaluating satellite-derived precipitation products over specific geographical regions, like drainage basins, rather than using broader regional divisions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 评估卫星衍生降水产品在特定地理区域，如流域，而不是使用更广泛的区域划分，可能会产生什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Evaluating satellite-derived precipitation products over specific geographical regions, such as drainage basins, can provide more precise insights into hydrological research, as these are crucial units for such studies. This approach may highlight region-specific challenges, like high false alarm ratios for light precipitation, and can improve the inversion algorithms used for satellite data processing by tailoring them to the unique characteristics of each basin.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 评估卫星衍生的降水产品在特定地理区域，如流域，能够为水文研究提供更精确的见解，因为这些是此类研究的重要单元。这种方法可能会突出区域特定的挑战，例如轻降水的高虚警率，并可以通过根据每个流域的独特特征量身定制反演算法来改善卫星数据处理。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the objective of using threshold-based techniques to identify extreme precipitation events in critical regions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用基于阈值的技术识别关键区域的极端降水事件的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to correctly identify extreme precipitation events in critical regions, providing local government departments with the necessary information to make decisions that minimize loss of life and property.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是正确识别关键区域的极端降水事件，为地方政府部门提供必要的信息，以便做出决策，减少生命和财产损失。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to evaluate the accuracy of satellite-derived precipitation data in regions with complex terrain or sparse station distribution?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在复杂地形或观测站分布稀疏的地区，评估卫星衍生降水数据准确性所使用的程序有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The accuracy of satellite precipitation products is evaluated using traditional metrics such as Pearson correlation coefficient (R), root mean square error (ERMS), mean absolute error (EMA), and relative error (ER). Additionally, detection capability is assessed using categorical statistical indicators such as detection rate (POD), false alarm rate (RFA), frequency bias (B), and equitable threat score (SET).
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 卫星降水产品的准确性通过传统指标进行评估，如皮尔逊相关系数（R）、均方根误差（ERMS）、平均绝对误差（EMA）和相对误差（ER）。此外，检测能力通过分类统计指标进行评估，如检测率（POD）、虚警率（RFA）、频率偏差（B）和公平威胁评分（SET）。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can data consistency be ensured when comparing different satellite precipitation products?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何在比较不同卫星降水产品时确保数据一致性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Data consistency is ensured by resampling the GPM data to the same spatial resolution as the TRMM data. The TRMM 3B42 V7 product has a spatial resolution of 0.25°×0.25°, and the GPM IMERG Final Run product is resampled to the same spatial resolution for accurate comparison.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据一致性通过将GPM数据重采样到与TRMM数据相同的空间分辨率来确保。TRMM 3B42 V7产品的空间分辨率为0.25°×0.25°，GPM IMERG最终运行产品被重采样到相同的空间分辨率，以便进行准确比较。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods can be employed to identify and analyze extreme precipitation events using satellite data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以采用哪些方法来识别和分析极端降水事件，使用卫星数据？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Extreme precipitation events are identified by evaluating rainfall using the percentile method to determine extreme precipitation thresholds. Dates with extreme precipitation are recognized based on these thresholds, and the surface inundation range during these events is analyzed using GPM IMERG Final Run daily rainfall data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 极端降水事件通过评估降雨量并使用百分位法确定极端降水阈值来识别。根据这些阈值，识别出极端降水的日期，并利用GPM IMERG最终运行的每日降雨数据分析这些事件期间的地表淹没范围。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What advancements in satellite remote sensing technology have enabled the collection of accurate spatiotemporal precipitation data over remote or complex terrain areas?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 卫星遥感技术的哪些进展使得在偏远或复杂地形地区收集准确的时空降水数据成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The rapid development of satellite remote sensing technology over the past decade has enabled the collection of high spatiotemporal resolution precipitation data. The launch of the GPM satellite by NASA and JAXA, which carries a dual-frequency radar system and improved microwave radiometer, has enhanced the detection capability for light and solid precipitation, facilitating more accurate data collection over remote or complex terrain areas.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 过去十年卫星遥感技术的快速发展使得高时空分辨率降水数据的收集成为可能。由NASA和JAXA发射的GPM卫星搭载了双频雷达系统和改进的微波辐射计，增强了对轻微和固态降水的探测能力，从而在偏远或复杂地形区域实现了更准确的数据收集。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodological approaches enable the evaluation of satellite precipitation product accuracy across different geographic and climatic regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论方法能够评估卫星降水产品在不同地理和气候区域的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Methodological approaches that enable the evaluation of satellite precipitation product accuracy include using traditional evaluation metrics like Pearson correlation coefficient, root mean square error, mean absolute error, and relative error, along with categorical statistical indicators such as detection rate, false alarm rate, frequency bias, and equitable threat score. These methods allow for a systematic comparison of satellite data against ground observations across diverse geographic and climatic regions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 评估卫星降水产品准确性的方法论包括使用传统评估指标，如皮尔逊相关系数、均方根误差、平均绝对误差和相对误差，以及分类统计指标，如检测率、虚警率、频率偏差和公平威胁评分。这些方法允许对卫星数据与地面观测在不同地理和气候区域进行系统比较。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might satellite-derived precipitation products fail to accurately measure precipitation in high altitude and arid regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 卫星衍生的降水产品在高海拔和干旱地区可能无法准确测量降水的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The challenges include poor accuracy of the GPM precipitation product in high altitude and arid regions and a high false alarm ratio for light precipitation, which suggests that the IMERG inversion algorithm needs improvement.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括GPM降水产品在高海拔和干旱地区的准确性较差，以及轻度降水的误报率较高，这表明IMERG反演算法需要改进。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are potential reasons for the discrepancy in performance between the TRMM and GPM satellite precipitation products?
Expectation.QuestionCn: TRMM和GPM卫星降水产品之间性能差异的潜在原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The GPM satellite, as the successor of the TRMM, has enhanced detection capabilities due to its latest dual-frequency radar system and improved microwave radiometer performance, which allows it to outperform TRMM over various drainage basins and Mainland China.
Expectation.AnswerCn: GPM卫星作为TRMM的继任者，凭借其最新的双频雷达系统和改进的微波辐射计性能，具有增强的探测能力，使其在各个流域和中国大陆的表现优于TRMM。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might traditional ground-based methods for precipitation data collection be less effective in remote or complex terrain areas?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 传统的地面降水数据收集方法在偏远或复杂地形地区可能效果较差的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Traditional ground-based methods, such as rain gauge observations, while highly precise at point scales, are sparse in distribution in remote or complex terrain areas due to logistical challenges, necessitating the use of satellite remote sensing technology for comprehensive data collection.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 传统的地面观测方法，如雨量计观测，虽然在点尺度上非常精确，但由于后勤挑战，在偏远或复杂地形地区分布稀疏，因此需要使用卫星遥感技术进行全面的数据收集。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How effective are satellite-based precipitation data collection methods, such as those using GPM and TRMM, in capturing accurate spatiotemporal distribution of precipitation in diverse geographic regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 卫星基降水数据收集方法，如使用GPM和TRMM，在捕捉不同地理区域降水的准确时空分布方面效果如何？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Satellite-based precipitation data collection methods, like GPM and TRMM, provide high spatiotemporal resolution data that are crucial for capturing precipitation in diverse regions. However, challenges remain, particularly in high altitude and arid regions where the GPM product exhibits poor accuracy and high false alarm ratios for light precipitation.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 基于卫星的降水数据收集方法，如GPM和TRMM，提供了高时空分辨率的数据，这对于捕捉不同地区的降水至关重要。然而，仍然存在挑战，特别是在高海拔和干旱地区，GPM产品在轻降水方面表现出较差的准确性和较高的误报率。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the primary challenges associated with the accuracy validation of satellite precipitation products, and how might these challenges impact the use of such data in hydrological research?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 与卫星降水产品的准确性验证相关的主要挑战是什么，这些挑战可能如何影响在水文研究中使用此类数据？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The primary challenges associated with the accuracy validation of satellite precipitation products include limited accuracy in certain geographic areas, such as high altitude and arid regions, and high false alarm ratios for light precipitation. These challenges can impact the use of such data in hydrological research, as they may affect the reliability of precipitation measurements critical for modeling and analysis.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 卫星降水产品准确性验证的主要挑战包括在某些地理区域（如高海拔和干旱地区）准确性有限，以及轻降水的高虚警率。这些挑战可能会影响水文研究中对这些数据的使用，因为它们可能影响对降水测量的可靠性，而降水测量对建模和分析至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In the context of precipitation data collection, what potential improvements could be made to satellite inversion algorithms to enhance the detection accuracy of systems like GPM IMERG?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在降水数据收集的背景下，可以对卫星反演算法进行哪些潜在改进，以提高像GPM IMERG这样的系统的检测准确性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Potential improvements to satellite inversion algorithms for systems like GPM IMERG could focus on enhancing detection capabilities in high altitude and arid regions, as well as reducing false alarm ratios for light precipitation. These improvements could involve refining the dual-frequency radar system and microwave radiometer performance to better capture precipitation dynamics in challenging environments.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 对像GPM IMERG这样的卫星反演算法的潜在改进可以集中在增强高海拔和干旱地区的探测能力，以及降低轻度降水的误报率。这些改进可以涉及优化双频雷达系统和微波辐射计的性能，以更好地捕捉在具有挑战性环境中的降水动态。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how data collection methods ensure accuracy in regions with complex terrain and sparse distribution of measurement stations.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白数据收集方法如何在地形复杂和测量站分布稀疏的地区确保准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Traditional methods based on ground rain gauge observations offer high precision at point scales but are sparse in distribution in remote or complex terrain areas. Satellite remote sensing technologies, such as the GPM satellite, provide high spatiotemporal resolution precipitation data, helping to overcome the logistical challenges of ground-based data collection in such regions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 传统的基于地面雨量计观测的方法在点尺度上具有高精度，但在偏远或复杂地形地区分布稀疏。卫星遥感技术，如GPM卫星，提供高时空分辨率的降水数据，有助于克服在这些地区进行地面数据收集的后勤挑战。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the challenges faced when evaluating the accuracy of satellite-derived precipitation products over large and diverse geographical areas.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在广泛和多样的地理区域评估卫星衍生降水产品的准确性时面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Challenges include the poor accuracy of GPM precipitation products in high altitude and arid regions, as well as a high false alarm ratio for light precipitation over the drainage basins in Southeast China, which complicates the evaluation of its IMERG inversion algorithm.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 挑战包括GPM降水产品在高海拔和干旱地区的准确性较差，以及在中国东南部流域轻降水的高误报率，这使得评估其IMERG反演算法变得复杂。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how datasets from different sources are integrated to improve the reliability of precipitation research.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解来自不同来源的数据集是如何整合在一起以提高降水研究的可靠性的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The integration involves using ground precipitation data from sources like the China Meteorological Data Network and satellite data such as TRMM 3B42 V7 and GPM IMERG from NASA. The GPM data is resampled to match the spatial resolution of TRMM, allowing for consistent comparison and evaluation of precipitation accuracy.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 该集成涉及使用来自中国气象数据网的地面降水数据以及来自NASA的卫星数据，如TRMM 3B42 V7和GPM IMERG。GPM数据被重采样以匹配TRMM的空间分辨率，从而实现降水准确性的持续比较和评估。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please evaluate the effectiveness of various data collection methods for obtaining accurate spatiotemporal distribution of precipitation in remote or complex terrain areas.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请评估在偏远或复杂地形区域获取准确降水时空分布的各种数据收集方法的有效性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Traditional methods based on ground rain gauge observations offer high precision at point scales but face distribution challenges in remote or complex terrain areas. Satellite remote sensing technology, particularly products like TRMM and GPM, provides high spatiotemporal resolution precipitation data, enhancing the ability to detect medium and large-scale precipitation. However, challenges remain with accuracy in high altitude and arid regions, as well as high false alarm ratios for light precipitation.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 传统的基于地面雨量计观测的方法在点尺度上提供了高精度，但在偏远或复杂地形区域面临分布挑战。卫星遥感技术，特别是像TRMM和GPM这样的产品，提供了高时空分辨率的降水数据，增强了检测中等和大规模降水的能力。然而，在高海拔和干旱地区的准确性以及轻降水的高虚警率等问题仍然存在挑战。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges and limitations in the accuracy validation of satellite-derived precipitation products.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析卫星衍生降水产品准确性验证中的挑战和局限性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Accuracy validation studies of GPM precipitation data have been limited to short-term evaluations, with time series not exceeding a year and lacking monthly scale analysis. Moreover, existing studies often use station density, climate, and topographic characteristics for regional division, without conducting evaluations on a basin scale. The GPM product also shows poor accuracy in high altitude and arid regions and a high false alarm ratio for light precipitation over Southeast China drainage basins.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: GPM降水数据的准确性验证研究主要局限于短期评估，时间序列不超过一年，且缺乏按月尺度的分析。此外，现有研究通常使用站点密度、气候和地形特征进行区域划分，而没有在流域尺度上进行评估。GPM产品在高海拔和干旱地区的准确性较差，并且在中国东南部流域对轻度降水的误报率较高。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential strategies for expanding and refining datasets related to extreme precipitation events in key regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在关键区域扩展和完善与极端降水事件相关的数据集的潜在策略。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Datasets like the GPM IMERG Final Run provide a basis for evaluating precipitation. Expanding datasets could involve integrating data from additional meteorological stations or remote sensing sources, using varied temporal and spatial resolutions. Resampling techniques could ensure consistency with existing data. Incorporating more basin-scale analysis could refine the dataset's applicability for hydrological modeling and improve extreme precipitation event detection capabilities.
